meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat tuberculosis and other bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed rifampin to help fight the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: She took rifampin daily to treat her tuberculosis.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria in the body were no match for the mighty rifampin!
meanings.sent4: Rifampin acted like a superhero, battling the tuberculosis bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The rifampin pill was like a tiny soldier fighting off the bacterial invaders.
